t: You Won’t Believe What Amazon Was Almost Called
s: December 12, 2024 - Before Bezos settled on Amazon, he strongly considered naming the website Relentless. According to the book The Everything Store: Jeff Bezos and the Age of Amazon by Brad Stone, Bezos even bought the Relentless.com domain in September 1994.
